trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lake Villa
There were no other sightings in Lake Villa on or around August 1st 2003
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home through a neighborhood on hot and sunny summer afternoon going about 20-25 mph. out of the corner of my eye i saw something gliding in the air at the edge of the neighborhood near a pond\swamp and field. i immediately thought(and still wonder if)it was a kite, but recognized as i focused that it was a few individual non-shining,metallic spheres that were about the size of a pilates\exercise ball each. they were in a flat triangle formation, which did not change\falter the entire time i saw it. the object\s was in constant motion. it was about 15 ft. high when i first noticed it and glided up near the side of a house and over the roof when i lost visual for a sec. because it was behind the house. it then emerged from behind the house at about 25-30 ft.(high enough to go over a 2 story roof). it continued to glide towards the field which went up a shallow slope going northwest. i watched it till it was out of view from going up and over this hill. it glided very slowly(10-15 mph) and gracefully(like a bird enjoying the wind) the whole time. the speed was consistent\ no deviations. there was no sound. a side note: my mom was boating on my lake which is southeast from this sighting and said she saw "something" slowly gliding towards where i was(northwest) at the time of this sighting. she didn't elaborate too much. all she said was that it was metal, strange, and queit. this happened around 4:30 p.m. in august. if it was a kite that i saw, the person holding the strings would of had to run through and over the field where this object glided over and out of sight. a wild field full of cattails and other thick vegetation.
Summary: No-shine metal spheres in a triangle formation gliding.
